history.content: I would personally not take any of those 3 classes together in 1 semester, unless it's literally your only two classes and you have a reduced course load...

Hi,

Next spring I'm planning on taking the EECS151 ASIC lab (I'm enrolled in the FPGA lab right now), as well as either CS 152 (taught by Krste Asanovic) or CS 162 (taught by Anthony D Joseph). To those of you who have taken any of these classes, which one do you recommend I pair with the ASIC lab, and approximately how much workload does each of these have? I could potentially also take all three of these classes if 152's workload isn't terrible compared to 162, which I hear is a beast of a class.

Thanks!
history.subject: Project Heavy Classes
